name: Bradford County Airport Authority
about: The Bradford County Airport Authority flying school, located at the Bradford County Airport (N27) in Towanda, PA, is dedicated to fostering general aviation and air commerce in the region. Our facility is home to the Towanda Flying Club, which offers affordable flying opportunities for student and experienced pilots alike, utilizing a well-maintained 1968 Cessna 172K. Instructor-led training is available, and our airport provides a supportive community for aviation enthusiasts. With modern amenities and a range of services, including aircraft maintenance through Heinrich Aviation, we are committed to providing a comprehensive and welcoming environment for all aspiring pilots. Our goal is to ensure every student receives top-notch training and support to achieve their aviation dreams.
